enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve modifying the internal state of the CompositeMap by adding or updating mappings.
The put method relies on the MapMutator for handling mutations, similar to how setMutator initializes this dependency.
The put method may need to check if a key already exists before adding or updating it, similar to the containsKey method.
Both methods modify the internal state of the CompositeMap, either by adding/updating or removing mappings.
